summary: Archer Follower Pack featuring Alexis, Aubrey, and Eira
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=6]Archer Follower Pack
[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][color=#f4cccc][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Featuring [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77114/?]Alexis[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77161/?]Aubrey[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78433/?]Eira[/url][/size][/font]
[/color]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/dzy87nnk7/20160903114454_1.jpg[/img]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=4]*Combination Pack of three followers with added Archery perks*[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f4cccc][size=3][i]Non-HDT Version Coming in Future

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
[/i][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]Name:  [u]Alexis[/u]
Race:  Nord
Voice:  Female Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .92
Weight:  60
Skin:  2K Leyenda Skin
Location:  Solitude Blacksmith (Inside)
Armor:  Black Viper
Jewelry:  Various KS Jewelry
Weapons:  Vanilla Ebony

Name:  [u]Aubrey[/u]
Race:  Nord w/ Dark Elf Attributes
Voice:  Female Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  60
Skin:  2K Leyenda Skin
Location:  Whiterun - Drunken Horseman
Armon:  Glass Bikini Armor
Weapons:  Vanilla Glass

Name:  [u]Eira[/u]
Race:  Nord
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .95
Weight:  100
Skin:  Optimized Fair Skin
Location:  Whiterun - Warmaiden's
Armor/Weapons:  Sotteta Huntress

[/font]
Class:  Combat Assassin
Levels with player.  Appropriate race traits/bonuses.
Archery perks.  Bonuses to Archery, Sneak, Light Armor.

ENB:  RealVision
Tested with AFT & EFF

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3xjg4x8nb/20160903024102_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS]HDT Compatible Skeleton
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeel System[/url][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS]All three together can be hard on certain computers so please be aware of your computer's limits when using.

*If You Have The Individual Followers Installed, I Highly Recommend Removing Before Installing Pack*[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Manual or your favorite mod manager[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Manual removal of all files or your favorite mod manager.[/font]
